pullRequest.title: ApplicationErrorScanner standardize input file location
pullRequest.bodyText:
Move application_errors.xml from resources directory to zapHomeFiles.
Update scan rule and unit test to address the change.
Signed-off-by: kingthorin kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com

afterCommit.message:

nodes.bodyText: Better to get the bytes with StandardCharsets.UTF_8 (that's what will be used to read the file).
